mapper.update: update auction set auction_like = CASE WHEN #{auction_like}='0' THEN (select auction_like from (select auction_like+1 auction_like from auction where auction_no = #{auction_no}) a) ELSE (select a.auction_like from (select auction_like-1 as auction_like from auction where auction_no = #{auction_no}) a) END where auction_no = #{auction_no}
